name: ChilloutVR
description:
Have you ever dreamt of a world where you can create and explore anything you want? ChilloutVR is a community-driven VR & Desktop sandbox game supposed to enable players as well as creators to create and explore a huge metaverse.


Welcome to ChilloutVR, your new place to be. Be able to create your own avatar or use existing avatars, explore a huge metaverse containing lots of different servers, game modes, avatars, and worlds.


Be creative! You can (and should!) create content for ChilloutVR using the Unity game engine and our content creation kit.
You can create game modes, avatars and worlds, share them and explore a huge community made pool of content.


Nothing is more important than friendships! Meet your friends around the globe whenever you wish to, show them what you are working on, talk to them and spend time with them. You can also make new friends by joining public instances or exploring the community and group system.


Stay safe! Using our various server and client sided tools we are able to make sure you can always feel safe in our game. No IP-grabs, no crashers.
Just enjoy Social VR how its meant to be!
